extension.description: The extension that enhances Markdown editing by enabling the creation of Qiita and Zenn-style admonition boxes.
markdown-info.previewStyles:
Select a stylesheet. Available options are as follows:

• default: Uses the default stylesheet.
• qiita: Applies a Qiita-like stylesheet.
• zenn: Applies a Zenn-like stylesheet.
markdown-info.defaultTitle: Sets the default title for boxes. This will be used when no title is specified.
